description: The winning combo of chocolate and orange makes for a crowd pleasing cupcake the whole family will love.
name: Chocolate Orange Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 160g unsalted butter, 100g for icing, 60g for batter
1 medium orange, keep zest and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced and lightly grease your cupcake baking tin.
In a mixing bowl, combine 60g of the butter and the egg with the caster sugar and 1 tbs of orange juice.
Add the flour to the mixture while stirring constantly to achieve a smooth batter.
Melt the chocolate in the microwave for a few seconds and add to the batter.
Equally pour the batter into 6 cupcake holders and bake for 25 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool.
In a mixing bowl, combine the icing sugar with 100g of butter. Using a piping bag, ice the cupcakes.
Garnish with orange zest before serving.
